title: What is YANDER?
answer: Yander is the ultimate meme token on Ethereum with massive Utility! Yander will be the token used to access “Yander’s Playground,” a robust and engaging Play to Earn platform to earn Yander tokens.

title: Why YANDER?
answer: Yander plans to bring the fun back to the blockchain by Addressing the problems we see with the other presales and tokens today. We’re sick and tired of the scams. YANDER is making ERC20’s fun again!

title: What is YANDER’s Utility?
answer: Holding YANDER will give you access to “Yander’s Playground.” a Robust and engaging pay to earn platform where holders can participate in multiple games to earn YANDER. Not a gamer? You can also simply stake YANDER to earn rewards.

title: When can I get my YANDER Tokens?
answer: As soon as presale is over, we will announce claim date. Everyone who purchases YANDER will be able to claim their tokens directly from the site. ONLY USE OFFICIAL YANDER SITE!!!!

title: When can I Trade YANDER?
answer: We will list YANDER on a top Decentralized Exchange after presale. We will announce claim and listing date then

title: When can I access “Yander’s Playground?”
answer: Beta version of “Yanders Playground is scheduled to be developed and launched in Q4.
